page.title: 20CLubs Penn Scout Troup
page.content: The scout troup I go to meets on a Thursday night near Warstones School. We wear a green beret, jeans with the scout belt, a green shirt with all the badges we have earned on and a green and blue neckerchief. Behind the two huts is a stretch of grass with some trees in which is a rope swing. We play a lot of games with the leaders including football, ship wreck, Colditz, quarters and ball over a chair. Sometimes we have to do scout training which involves making a stretcher and carrying the patrol leader, tying knots in ropes and making fireman's chairs and hauling people up to the beams. Every so often we have trips to places like Telford Ice Rink. Also we have jumble sales where the leaders, our parents and us try to raise money for our troup.
